channel.title: Drawing on Kage
channel.description: Recent content in Drawing on Kage

item.title: First Post!
item.description: I am Kage, nice to meet you! I have been drawing for some years now but I have stopped advancing… That’s probably because I practice very little… In order to fix this situation and finally be able to claim my place as “Kage, the great” I have decided to go back to the basics. For now I am doing the exercises in the book Drawing for the Absolute Begginer byÂ Mark and Mary Willenbrink.
